name: Conquest of the New World Deluxe Edition
name_original: Conquest of the New World Deluxe Edition
description:
Conquest of the New World Deluxe Edition is a strategy game developed by Quicksilver Software. It was originally released in 1996. It was published by Interplay Productions. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Conquest of the New World Deluxe Edition on PC.
